title: Kiyoshi
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Japanese, Buffet, Asian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Japanese all-you-can-eat buffet style restaurant with sushi as the specialty, of which some are clearly labeled vegan. Also vegan are grilled zucchini, baked banana, miso soup, vegetable and mushroom tempura, shimejis and more.
